data.title: Keep On Truckin' News - Magazine Advertising Costs
data.meta_description: Cost to advertise in Keep On Truckin' News. Find magazine advertising rates for Keep On Truckin' News.
data.text:
What is the cost to advertise in Keep On Truckin' News? Keep On Truckin' News is a monthly magazine. The magazine has a circulation of approximately 4,000. Published in Springfield, Illinois, this magazine is a popular trade publication. The parent company of the magazine is Mid-West Truckers Association.

Magazine Advertising Rate for Keep On Truckin' News

The estimated rate for ads in the magazine is $335.00. Note: This estimate is for a full-page, black and white ad. This is only an estimate. It may be completely incorrect. Actual prices may be higher or lower. Many factors influence current magazine ad rates. Contact the magazine's advertising department for an exact quote.

To place an ad, or receive more information on advertising rates, please contact Keep On Truckin' News at (217) 525-0310.

Keep On Truckin' News Contact Information

Keep On Truckin' News

2727 N Dirksen Pkwy

Springfield, IL

Phone: (217) 525-0310

Fax: (217) 525-0342

To update or correct magazine advertising information on this page, please use the link below:
